TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField

summary.span: 表示将显示为数据绑定控件中的图像的字段。

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as an image in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件使用类 (例如 和 ) 为显示的每条记录显示图像。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display an image for each record displayed. 对象的显示方式取决于使用它的数据绑定控件。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如， 控件 以列的形式显示对象，而控件则将 其显示为一行。For example, the control displays an object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要显示图像，必须将 对象从包含图像 URL 的数据源绑定到字段。To display images, you must bind an object to a field from a data source that contains the URL of an image. 这是通过设置属性来完成的 。This is accomplished by setting the property. 可以使用属性设置 URL 值的格式 。The URL value can be formatted by using the property. 每个图像还可以有与之关联的替代文本。Each image can also have alternate text associated with it. 当图像无法加载或不可用时，将显示此文本。This text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded, or is unavailable. 支持工具提示功能的浏览器还会将此文本显示为工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. 您可以使用下列方法之一为显示的图像指定替代文本：You can specify the alternate text for a displayed image by using one of the following methods: - 使用 属性指定适用于所有图像的替换文字。Use the property to specify alternate text that applies to all images. - 使用 属性将数据源中的字段绑定到 每个图像的属性。Use the property to bind a field from a data source to the property of each image. 这使你可以为每个显示的图像提供不同的替代文本。This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 绑定数据时，可以选择使用属性设置替换文字的格式 。When binding data, you can optionally format the alternate text by using the property. 如果图像的 URL 值为，则 `null` 无法显示图像。When the URL value for an image is `null`, an image cannot be displayed. 您可以 `null` 通过设置属性来显示字段值的替换图像 。You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the property. 可以通过设置属性来显示替换文本，而不是使用备用图像 。Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the property. 默认情况下，所有声明的字段都显示在数据绑定控件中。By default, all declared fields are displayed in a data-bound control. 可以 通过将属性设置为来隐藏数据绑定控件中的对象 `false` 。You can hide an object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 您可以自定义对象的页眉和页脚部分 。You can customize the header and footer sections of an object. 若要在页眉或页脚部分显示标题，请分别设置 或 属性。To display a caption in the header or footer section, set the or properties, respectively. 若要在页眉节而不是文本中显示图像，请设置 属性。To display an image in the header section instead of text, set the property. 通过将属性设置为，可以在对象中隐藏标头部分 `false` 。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些数据绑定控件 (例如 控件) 可以仅显示或隐藏控件的整个标题部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 这些数据绑定控件不支持 单个数据绑定字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual data-bound field. 若要显示或隐藏数据绑定控件的整个标头部分，请使用控件的 `ShowHeader` 属性 (如有) 。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available). 还可以 通过设置字段的不同部分的样式属性，自定义对象的外观 (字体颜色、背景色等) 。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |Style 属性Style property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||对象的子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置 。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||对象的脚注部分的样式设置 。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||对象的标头部分的样式设置 。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||对象中数据项的样式设置 。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 控件中的对象 来显示图像。The following example demonstrates how to use an object in a control to display an image. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/CS/ImageFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/VB/ImageFieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 当向动态创建的数据绑定控件添加字段时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要将对象动态添加 到数据绑定控件，请创建一个新的 对象，设置其属性，然后将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add an object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果使用 控件，请将 对象添加到 集合中。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可将字段动态添加到数据绑定控件，但强烈建议根据需要静态声明字段，然后将其显示或隐藏。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段可减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数将对象动态添加 到控件的 集合 。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to dynamically add an object to the collection of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldCtor/CS/ImageFieldCtorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldCtor/VB/ImageFieldCtorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为 对象中的图像显示的备用文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed for an image in the object.

value.span: 显示在 对象中的图像的备用文本。

span.span: The alternate text for an image displayed in the object.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定对象中显示的图像的替换文字 。Use the property to specify the alternate text for the images displayed in an object. 当图像无法加载或不可用时，会显示替换文字。The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable. 支持工具提示功能的浏览器还会将此文本显示为工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. > [!NOTE] > 如果设置此属性，则对象中显示的所有图像 共享相同的备用文本。When this property is set, all images displayed in an object share the same alternate text. 作为替代方法，可以通过设置 属性而不是此属性将替换文本绑定到数据源中的字段。As an alternative, you can bind the alternate text to a field in a data source by setting the property instead of this property. 这使你可以为每个显示的图像提供不同的替代文本。This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 如果同时 设置了和 属性，则 属性优先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性为对象中显示的所有图像指定替换文字 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for all images displayed in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/CS/ImageFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/VB/ImageFieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示在从数据源返回字段值时，空字符串 ("") 值是否转换为 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string ("") values are converted to when the field values are returned from the data source.

value.span: 如果 值应当转换为 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if values should be converted to ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，用户在更新或插入记录时可能会输入空字符串作为字段值。Sometimes the user may enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records. 使用 属性可以指定在 `null` 数据源中更新数据字段时是否将空字符串值自动转换为。Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to `null` when the data field is updated in the data source > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，此类显示 `null` 为空字符串。The class displays `null` as empty strings by default. 若要显示不同的值，请设置 属性。To display a different value, set the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中某个字段的名称，该字段包含的值要绑定到 对象中每个图像的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object.

value.span: 要绑定 对象中每个图像的 属性的字段名称。

span.span: The name of the field to bind the property of each image in an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可指定数据源中的字段的名称，该数据源包含要绑定到 对象中每个图像的属性的值 。Use the property to specify the name of the filed from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object. 使你能够为每个显示的图像提供不同的替代文本。The enables you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 当图像无法加载或不可用时，会显示替换文字。The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable. 支持工具提示功能的浏览器还会将此文本显示为工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置 属性而不是此属性来指定适用于所有图像的替代文本。You can specify alternate text that applies to all images by setting the property instead of this property. 如果同时 设置了和 属性，则 字段优先。If both the and properties are set, the field takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定数据源中的字段的名称，该字段包含要绑定到 对象中每个图像的属性的值 。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/CS/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/VB/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定 对象中每个图像的备用文本所呈现的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 指定 对象中每个图像的备用文本所呈现的格式的字符串。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，它指示备用文本现在应用特殊格式。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that now special formatting is applied to the alternate text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为对象中显示的图像的替换文本值指定自定义格式 。Use the property to specify a custom format for the alternate text values of the images displayed in an object. > [!NOTE] > 仅当设置了属性时，才应用格式字符串 。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 如果设置了属性，则不会应用该 属性。It is not applied when the property is set. 当您需要修改字段中包含的原始值时，这非常有用。This is useful when you need to modify the original value contained in the field. 如果 未设置该属性，则替换文本值不会获得任何特殊格式。If the property is not set, the alternate text values do not get any special formatting. 格式字符串可以是任何文本字符串，并且通常包含字段值的占位符。The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字符串 "项目值：" 中 {0} ，" {0} " 占位符替换为属性所指定的字段的值 。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the "{0}" placeholder is replaced with the value of the fields specified by the property. 格式字符串的其余部分显示为文本文本。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字符串不包含占位符，则不会在最终显示文本中包含来自数据源的字段值。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 占位符由以冒号分隔的两部分组成， ( "：" ) 并在大括号 ( " {} " ) 中换行 `{A:Bxx}` 。The placeholder consists of two parts separated by a colon (":") and wrapped in braces ("{}"), in the form `{A:Bxx}`. 常规示例中冒号 (前面的值 `A`) 在参数的从零开始的列表中指定字段值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此参数是格式设置语法的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 由于每个单元格中只有一个字段值，因此此值只能设置为0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒号和冒号后的值是可选的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 常规示例中冒号后面的字符 (`B`) 指定显示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出了常见格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学 (指数) 格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|以数字格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，但除外 `X` ，后者在指定的情况下显示十六进制字符。The format characters are not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 常规示例中格式字符后的值 (xx) 指定要显示的有效位数或小数位数。The value after the format character (xx in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字符串 " {0:F2} " 显示带有2个小数位的固定点数字。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with 2 decimal places. 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅 [格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information on formatting, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将 自定义格式应用于对象中的图像的替换文本值 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to apply a custom format to the alternate text values for the images in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/CS/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/VB/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 设置 .NET 中类型的格式

span.span: Formatting Types in .NET

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中某个字段的名称，该字段包含的值要绑定到 对象中每个图像的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object.

value.span: 要绑定到 对象中每个图像的 属性的字段名称。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the property of each image in an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要绑定到 对象中每个图像的属性的字段名称 。Use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of each image in an object. 指定的字段必须包含要显示在对象中的图像的 Url 。The specified field must contain the URLs for the images to display in the object. 还可以通过设置属性来设置 URL 值的格式 。You can optionally format the URL values by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 当字段值为时 `null` ，不能显示图像。When the filed value is `null`, an image cannot be displayed. 您可以 `null` 通过设置属性来显示字段值的替换图像 。You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the property. 可以通过设置属性来显示替换文本，而不是使用备用图像 。Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定要绑定到 对象中每个图像的属性的字段名称 。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of each image in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/CS/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/VB/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，用于指定 对象中每个图像的 URL 所呈现的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 一个字符串，用于指定 对象中每个图像的 URL 所呈现的格式。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，它指示 URL 未应用任何特殊格式。

span.span: The default is the empty string ("") , which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the URLs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为对象中显示的图像的 url 指定自定义格式 。Use the property to specify a custom format for the URLs of the images displayed in an object. 当你需要生成 URL 时（例如，当 对象只包含文件名时），此方法很有用。This is useful when you need to generate a URL, such as when the object simply contains the file name. 如果 未设置该属性，则 URL 值不会获得任何特殊格式。If the property is not set, the URL values do not get any special formatting. 格式字符串可以是任何文本字符串，并且通常包含字段值的占位符。The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字符串 "项目值：" 中 {0} ，" {0} " 占位符替换为属性所指定的字段的值 。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the "{0}" placeholder is replaced with the value of the fields specified by the property. 格式字符串的其余部分显示为文本文本。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字符串不包含占位符，则不会在最终显示文本中包含来自数据源的字段值。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 占位符由以冒号分隔的两部分组成， ( "：" ) 并在大括号 ( " {} " ) 中换行 `{A:Bxx}` 。The placeholder consists of two parts separated by a colon (":") and wrapped in braces ("{}"), in the form `{A:Bxx}`. 常规示例中冒号 (前面的值 `A`) 在参数的从零开始的列表中指定字段值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此参数是格式设置语法的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 由于每个单元格中只有一个字段值，因此此值只能设置为0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒号和冒号后的值是可选的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 常规示例中冒号后面的字符 (`B`) 指定显示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出了常见格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学 (指数) 格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|以数字格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，但除外 `X` ，后者在指定的情况下显示十六进制字符。The format characters are not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 常规示例中格式字符后的值 (xx) 指定要显示的有效位数或小数位数。The value after the format character (xx in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字符串 " {0:F2} " 显示带有2个小数位的固定点数字。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with 2 decimal places. 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅 [格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information on formatting, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将 自定义格式应用于对象中的图像的 URL 值 。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to apply a custom format to the URL values for the images in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/CS/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/VB/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 设置 .NET 中类型的格式

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法由与对象关联的数据控件调用 ，以便为字段的实例执行基本对象初始化，然后将该字段添加到字段集合中。The method is called by the data control with which the object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a field collection. 数据控件（例如 ） 在 `CreateChildControls` 调用其他方法（如） `CreateRow` 创建包含数据的特定行之前，在其方法中调用方法。Data controls such as and call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods such as `CreateRow` are called to create specific rows with data. 在编写使用 对象来执行对象的基本初始化的自定义数据绑定控件时，请调用此方法 。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for an object. 如果 派生的类型在 用方法中的数据或控件填充对象之前需要初始化对象，则实现此方法 。Implement this method if your -derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置当 属性所指定的字段值为 时，将要显示在 对象中的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display in an object when the value of the field specified by the property is .

value.span: 字段值为 时要显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display when the value of a field is .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性所指定的字段值为时 `null` ，不能在对象中显示图像 。When the value of the field specified by the property is `null`, an image cannot be displayed in an object. 使用 属性指定要在图像位置显示的文本。Use the property to specify the text to display in the image's place. 该文本通常指示普通图像不可用或找不到。The text usually indicates that the normal image is not available or cannot be found. > [!NOTE] > 作为替代方法，当字段值为时，可以 `null` 通过设置 属性而不是此属性来显示备用图像。As an alternative, you can display an alternate image when the field value is `null` by setting the property instead of this property. 如果 同时设置了和属性，则 属性具有优先权。If the and properties are both set, the property has precedence. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定在属性所指定的字段值为时要显示的文本 `null` 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text to display when the value of the field specified by the property is `null`. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/CS/ImageFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/VB/ImageFieldvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性所指定的字段值为时 `null` ，不能在对象中显示图像 。When the value of the field specified by the property is `null`, an image cannot be displayed in an object. 使用 属性指定要显示的备用图像的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to an alternate image to display. 备用图像通常是一个图像，指示正常图像不可用或找不到。The alternate image is usually an image that indicates that the normal image is not available or cannot be found. > [!NOTE] > 作为替代方法，可以在字段值为时， `null` 通过设置 属性而不是此属性来显示文本。As an alternative, you can simply display text when the field value is `null` by setting the property instead of this property. 如果 同时设置了和属性，则 属性具有优先权。If the and properties are both set, the property has precedence. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定在属性所指定的字段值为时要显示的备用图像的 URL `null` 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to an alternate image to display when the value of the field specified by the property is `null`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 当数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时，用户可以修改属性所指定的字段的值。By default, the values of the field specified by the property can be modified by the user when a data-bound control is in edit mode. 若要防止用户更改字段的值，请将此属性设置为 `true` 。To prevent the user from changing the values of the field, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在 对象中， 属性通常包含字段的名称，该字段包含对象中显示的图像的 url。In an object, the property usually contains the name of the field that contains the URLs to the images displayed in the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指示 无法在编辑模式下修改表示对象中显示图像的 url 的字段值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the field values that represent the URLs to the images displayed in an object cannot be modified in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldReadOnly/CS/ImageFieldReadOnlycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldReadOnly/VB/ImageFieldReadOnlyvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly string ThisExpression;
.field public static initonly string ThisExpression
Public Shared ReadOnly ThisExpression As String
public: static initonly System::String ^ ThisExpression;
staticval mutable ThisExpression : string

summary.span: 表示“this”表达式。

span.span: Represents the "this" expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段用于指示 应将对象绑定到数据源本身，而不是绑定到数据源的字段。The field is used to indicate that the object should bind to the data source itself rather than a filed of the data source. 在这种情况下，由对象的方法返回的值 将显示在字段中。In this case, the value returned by the object's method will be displayed in the field.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ValidateSupportsCallback ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateSupportsCallback() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();
override this.ValidateSupportsCallback : unit -> unit

summary.span: 确定 对象中所包含的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于确定包含在对象中的控件是否 支持回调。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks. 此方法已实现为空方法 (一个方法，该方法不包含任何代码) 以指示支持回调。This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 从类派生的类 可以重写此方法，以指示字段包含的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指示支持回调，请将此方法实现为空方法，该方法不会引发异常;否则，将引发异常，并提供有用的消息，说明不支持回调的原因。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
